summary: Successfully completed 2 commits. Committed 2 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(config): update last run log with execution results

Updated timestamp, duration, and stats to reflect processing of 5 files
with 5 successful commits. Expanded commits array to include details of
all generated commits, updated summary and subjects accordingly, and
improved rate metrics. This log captures the latest kcmt run execution
for tracking and debugging purposes.

feat(core): integrate provider-specific default timeouts

- Import `resolve_default_request_timeout` from providers.base - Use
provider's default timeout as fallback for per-file timeout instead of
hardcoded 5.0 - This allows different LLM providers to specify
appropriate request timeouts, improving reliability and performance
across providers

subjects: chore(config): update last run log with execution results
